name: Alien Blaster 2000
description:
this is an unfinished gamejam entry for https://itch.io/jam/celebrate-programmer-art

how to play:

  • cursor keys or WASD: move
  • space or M or X: shoot

if your browser does strange things when using cursor keys, try WASD instead

when shooting, your facing position will be LOCKED, i.e. you will always face into the direction until you stop shooting and walk in a different direction

the game is unfinished, it was started on the last day of the jam because of lack of inspiration. source code can be viewed as it's a browser game (made with javascript)

if you want to play it in zoomed mode, check this link out: https://drwuro.com/zeha/cpajam/
